alert.note: Alert for Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Gulf, south central Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida and southwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 615 PM EDT/515 PM CDT/... At 547 PM EDT/447 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Stonemill Creek, or 14 miles south of Blountstown, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stonemill Creek, Orange, Wewahitchka, Marysville, Scotts Ferry, Estiffanulga, Kern, Lewis, Chipola Cutoff, Chipola Park and Red Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
